messages.messageBody:
Hi Katie,

I didn't know you were here!

Mary Ellen
I actually got kicked off of a list (that I started!) for voicing the
opinion that part time unschooling and unschooling groups getting together 3
times a week for 'classes' planned entirely by the parents with zero input
from the kids, was not unschooling!


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Subject: Re: This list
messages.msgSnippet: I actually got kicked off of a list (that I started!) for voicing the opinion that part time unschooling and unschooling groups getting together 3 times a week
messages.messageBody:
I actually got kicked off of a list (that I started!) for voicing the
opinion that part time unschooling and unschooling groups getting together 3
times a week for 'classes' planned entirely by the parents with zero input
from the kids, was not unschooling!

Pushed up my cynicism level a bit!

Katie

>
> It actually annoys me to be on an unschooling
>list and then hear people talking about how many worksheets they are giving

Have you considered posting and expressing that annoyance? Shake 'em up a
little?
Heidi
